short_summary: EXPANDED PURCHASE ORDER FOR A DIGITAL HOLOGRAPHIC CAMERA
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a camera that can capture images and video in three dimensions. One camera was requested originally. This procurement has been updated to select an acceptable supplier and to request bids for two cameras for the initial period with the option to purchase additional cameras in the future. The camera should be able to capture high resolution in both two dimensions and three dimensions.
full_summary:
## Digital Holographic Camera Tender Announcement

### Notice Details

* **Tender Title**: Digital Holographic Camera
* **Reference Number**: cb-421-30984701
* **Solicitation Number**: 30005038
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-30
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-15T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-12-15
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: Burlington, Ontario

### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, National Capital Region (NCR) K1A 0E6, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Jean Francois Guilmeus
	+ **Email**: jeanfrancois.guilmeus@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
	+ **Phone**: (343) 630-0762
	+ **Fax**: None

### Tender Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (Great Lakes and Areas) requires the supply of a Digital Holographic Camera, including parts necessary for its functioning, for delivery to Burlington, Ontario.

### Documents

The tender notice and tender documents can be found at [external URL 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26367/30005038---npp_en_0.pdf) and [external URL 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26367/30005038---npp_fr_1.pdf) respectively. 

Please note that the tender has expired. NHs should not provide any information or propose pricing. If you want to receive any contract notices again and submit quotes, kindly contact us privately. We will do our best to send you any information about contractors. 

Existing contractors will certainly benefit from extra push towards other contracts within government environment. 

Please feel free to let me grow professional environment and excellent contracts knowledge I
